Home.3: I am a web and application designer. If you are interested in the first page, learn more about me and my projects. Enjoy watching :)

Front.3: I have been working as a Front-End Developer for more than 2 years. I am a Freelancer, I design and create simple websites, update and introduce new functionalities in web applications for international clients. I am very passionate about this field of programming, I am constantly increasing my knowledge and skills in CSS, JavaScript, the whole React environment and also the backend - NodeJs.

Graphic.3: I have been doing computer graphics and design for over 10 years. While working for many companies and as a freelancer, I was dealing with corporate identity, designing logos, website layouts, and I also did 3D graphics along with creating animations.

Experience.Title: EXPERIENCE
Experience.Subtitle: WHERE I'VE BEEN, WHAT I DID :)

1.JobTitle: Freelancer Graphic Designer / Front-End Developer / 3D Designer
Description: Creating Landing Pages and simple web pages / applications using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript,
Building components and new functionalities using ReactJs, using Styled-Components in styling,
Designing graphics, layouts and mockups of websites, applications using Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator , Figma, Adobe XD,
Interior visualization using SketchUp and V-Ray photorealistic rendering.

2.JobTitle: Freelancer Graphic Designer / Front-End Developer / 3D Designer
Description: Creating Landing Pages and simple web pages / applications using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery
Designing graphics, layouts and mockups of websites, applications using Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator , Figma, Adobe XD,

3.JobTitle: 3D Artist, Flash Designer / Developer, Front-End Developer
Description: Creating short product videos based on 3D graphics (3D modeling, video editing, post-production) using 3D Studio Max, Adobe Premiere and Adobe After Effects,
Designing and building websites based on HTML, CSS and Flash / ActionScript
Creation of animations and interactive websites in Macromedia Flash using ActionScript,
Layout design of websites ( Photoshop, Illustrator ),
UI design based on Macromedia Flash,ActionScript and HTML,
Layout design of web pages in Adobe Photoshop,

Portfolio.Title: PORTFOLIO
Portfolio.Subtitle: A LITTLE BIT OF MY PROJECTS

List.Title: GREG'S PORTFOLIO
List.Description: This is an internet site dedicated to me as a FRONT-END DEVELOPER and GRPAHIC DESIGNER. You can see here how I code and how I draw and also learn more information about me.

List.Title: AI CHAT GPT
List.Description: It is an application based on OpenAI ChatGTP. After giving your name, you can choose 6 topics of conversation with AI. When you select one of them, it displays a chat where you can chat.

List.Title: JAVASCRIPT DRUM MACHINE
List.Description: This is a simple music App written in JavaScript. On there You have 9 pads with drum sounds. Through press keys on keyboard, You can play drum rhythms. Also You can play background loop music track for better play.

List.Title: UNIQUE TODO LIST
List.Description: The application includes a to-do list, where we enter the tasks to be done and the time. 10 seconds before the task time expires, a bell rings, after which the task is deleted.

Contact.Description: If You have any questions or would like to cooperate, please contact me :)
